name: floats (prototype)
description:
You're a cube in space. Your're caught on a harsh, random 2D planet, filled with deadly obstacles, many stupid enemies and some yellow stuff to collect. There's not much to do here, than running around, killing and collecting.

Since this is a prototype, you can expect many bugs and glitches. But you cannot expect gameplay.

Controls:
Movement + Jump: WASD + Space // Left analog stick + A (XBOX360)
Shooting: Arrow keys // Right analog stick
Switch Weapon: Q

Floats originally was my entry for Ludum Dare 32. It borrows its visual style from the famous rymdkapsel by Martin Jonasson. Floats is like what I thought rymdkapsel would be, when I first saw it.

Made by Martin Knopf (@mknpf)
